Welcome to CactusTool’s documentation!¶

CactusTool package provides tools to analysis and visualization CACTUS simulations.

CactusTool uses matplotlib and yt to visualize gird functions. yt supports structured, variable-resolution meshes, unstructured meshes, and discrete or sampled data such as particles.

CactusTool code benefits from the publicly available PostCactus and PyCactus code. It also provides some specialized functions.

Note

Still in Prepare
